hero.title: Logistics solutions for Home Care
hero.description: We deliver your cleaning and home products to every point of sale with efficiency and control.

intro.text: At Yobel SCM we manage the supply chain for home care products. From manufacturing to distribution, we offer integrated solutions that guarantee availability, traceability and regulatory compliance.

items.title: Home Manufacturing
items.description: Production, packaging and reconditioning of cleaning items, air fresheners and utensils, meeting BPM and safety standards.

items.title: Flexible Warehousing
items.description: Inventory management by product line or sales channel, with WMS and batch or expiration date control.

items.title: Omnichannel Distribution
items.description: B2B, retail and e-commerce deliveries with full traceability and 99.6% OTIF compliance.

items.title: Value-Added Services (VAS)
items.description: Kitting, promotional pack assembly, labeling and customization for seasons or launches.

items.title: Foreign Trade
items.description: Import and export coordination of raw materials and finished products to supply regional markets.

benefits.title: Availability, control and efficiency
items: Logistics cost reduction through full process integration.
24/7 traceability from origin to point of sale.
Operational flexibility for campaigns or seasons.
Control by batch, SKU or distribution channel.

items.title: Promotional campaigns
items.fullDesc: Assembly and distribution of special packs or combos by season.

items.title: Retail replenishment
items.fullDesc: Continuous supply to supermarkets, department stores and marketplaces.

items.title: Product line launches
items.fullDesc: National distribution of new products or improved versions.

items.title: E-commerce management
items.fullDesc: Preparation and direct dispatch to end consumer.

items.title: Reconditioning
items.fullDesc: Packaging, labeling or format adjustments by sales channel.

certificates.description: We operate with international certifications that guarantee quality, safety and sustainability at every stage.
